title: Four Stories of Torture, Rape and Murder from the Chicago Police Department Part 1
itunes:title: Four Stories of Torture, Rape and Murder from the Chicago Police Department Part 1
description:
The gang takes on two stories from dark history of the Chicago police department: the Burge torture ring and the police's murder of Laquan McDonald and Rahm Emanuel's subsequent coverup.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
